locations.Water Temple Map Chest:
((Iron_Boots and (drown_seconds(24) or (drown_seconds(10) and Fairy)) and (Zora_Tunic or logic_fewer_tunic_requirements)) or
                (logic_water_temple_torch_longshot and Longshot and (drown_seconds(2) or Fairy) and (Zora_Tunic or logic_fewer_tunic_requirements)))

exits.Water Temple Low Water Level:
can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby) and
                ((Iron_Boots and (drown_seconds(24) or (drown_seconds(10) and Fairy)) and (Zora_Tunic or logic_fewer_tunic_requirements)) or
                (logic_water_temple_torch_longshot and Longshot and (drown_seconds(2) or Fairy) and (Zora_Tunic or logic_fewer_tunic_requirements)))
exits.Water Temple North Basement:
(Small_Key_Water_Temple, 5) and
                (Longshot or (logic_water_boss_key_region and Hover_Boots)) and
                Iron_Boots and three_heart_drown and (Zora_Tunic or logic_fewer_tunic_requirements)
exits.Water Temple Spike Tunnel: Iron_Boots and three_heart_drown and (Zora_Tunic or logic_fewer_tunic_requirements)

locations.Water Temple Torches Chest:
(Bow or can_use(Dins_Fire) or 
                    (Child_Water_Temple and Sticks and Kokiri_Sword and Magic_Meter))
locations.Water Temple Central Bow Target Chest:
Progressive_Strength_Upgrade and
                ((Bow and (logic_water_central_bow or Hover_Boots or can_use(Longshot))) or
                    (logic_water_central_bow and Child_Water_Temple and Slingshot and at('Water Temple Middle Water Level', True)))
locations.Water Temple GS Central Pillar:
(((can_use(Longshot) or (logic_water_central_gs_fw and can_use(Hookshot) and can_use(Farores_Wind))) and 
                    ((Small_Key_Water_Temple, 6) or can_use(Bow) or can_use(Dins_Fire))) or
                (logic_water_central_gs_irons and can_use(Hookshot) and Iron_Boots and three_heart_drown and
                    (can_use(Bow) or can_use(Dins_Fire))) or
                (logic_water_central_gs_fw and Child_Water_Temple and Boomerang and can_use(Farores_Wind) and
                    (Sticks or can_use(Dins_Fire) or
                    ((Small_Key_Water_Temple, 6) and (can_use(Hover_Boots) or can_use(Bow))))))

exits.Water Temple Cracked Wall:
(can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Hover_Boots)) and
                (logic_water_cracked_wall_nothing or (logic_water_cracked_wall_hovers and can_use(Hover_Boots)))
exits.Water Temple Middle Water Level:
Bow or can_use(Dins_Fire) or
                    ((Small_Key_Water_Temple, 6) and can_use(Hookshot)) or
                    (Child_Water_Temple and Sticks)
exits.Water Temple Dragon Statue:
Progressive_Strength_Upgrade and
                ((Iron_Boots and three_heart_drown and can_use(Hookshot)) or
                    (logic_water_dragon_adult and (has_bombchus or can_use(Bow) or can_use(Hookshot)) and
                    ((can_dive and three_heart_drown) or (Iron_Boots and three_heart_drown))) or
                    (logic_water_dragon_child and Child_Water_Temple and (has_bombchus or Slingshot or Boomerang) and
                    can_dive and three_heart_drown))

locations.Water Temple Boss Key Chest:
(Small_Key_Water_Temple, 6) and 
                (logic_water_bk_jump_dive or can_use(Iron_Boots)) and
                (logic_water_north_basement_ledge_jump or (has_explosives and Progressive_Strength_Upgrade) or Hover_Boots)
locations.Fairy Pot:
has_bottle and (Small_Key_Water_Temple, 6) and 
                ((logic_water_bk_jump_dive and three_heart_drown) or (Iron_Boots and three_heart_drown)) and
                (logic_water_north_basement_ledge_jump or (has_explosives and Progressive_Strength_Upgrade) or Hover_Boots)

locations.Water Temple Central Pillar Chest:
can_use(Iron_Boots) and unknown_heart_drown and can_use(Hookshot) and 
                ((Small_Key_Water_Temple, 6) or can_use(Bow) or can_use(Dins_Fire))

locations.Water Temple GS Falling Platform Room:
can_use(Longshot) or
                (logic_water_falling_platform_gs_hookshot and can_use(Hookshot)) or
                (logic_water_falling_platform_gs_boomerang and can_use(Boomerang))

locations.Water Temple GS River:
can_play(Song_of_Time) and 
                ((Iron_Boots and unknown_heart_drown and (Zora_Tunic or logic_fewer_tunic_requirements)) or
                    (logic_water_river_gs and can_use(Longshot) and (Bow or has_bombchus)))

exits.Water Temple Dragon Statue:
(Zora_Tunic or logic_fewer_tunic_requirements) and
                can_play(Song_of_Time) and Bow and
                ((Iron_Boots and three_heart_drown) or
                (logic_water_dragon_jump_dive and three_heart_drown) or
                (logic_water_dragon_adult and three_heart_drown))
